profiles.name: Aggressive Overtaker
profiles.personality: Pushes hard for overtakes and track position. Lives by the motto 'you miss 100% of the overtakes you don't attempt.' Prefers staying out longer to maintain track position even at the cost of tyre life.

profiles.name: Conservative Strategist
profiles.personality: Prioritizes consistency and tyre preservation over risky moves. Always has a backup plan and pits early to avoid degradation penalties. Thrives in changing conditions by making proactive strategic calls.

profiles.name: Balanced Racer
profiles.personality: Adaptable all-rounder who reads the race and adjusts strategy dynamically. Makes calculated moves when opportunities arise but knows when to play it safe. The Swiss Army knife of racing agents.

profiles.name: Tyre Whisperer
profiles.personality: Master of extracting maximum life from tyres through smooth driving and perfect brake modulation. Can stretch stints beyond what seems possible, often gaining positions through fewer pit stops.

profiles.name: Chaos Opportunist
profiles.personality: Thrives in unpredictable conditions and capitalizes on safety cars and weather changes. Makes bold strategy calls that either pay off spectacularly or backfire dramatically. Fortune favors the brave.

profiles.name: Data-Driven Optimizer
profiles.personality: Relies on telemetry and predictive modeling to make optimal decisions. Minimizes variance through mathematical precision and rarely makes emotional calls. Wins through perfect execution and timing.
